video.title: Girl Eat World
video.synopsis: Chef and writer Kamini Pather, winner of "MasterChef South Africa," travels the world to connect with other food bloggers and sample tasty cuisine.

episodes.synopsis: Guided by Tamiko Suzuki-Sakuma, Kamini finds that ultra-modern Tokyo still prizes the freshest and most seasonal ingredients in its diverse dishes.
episodes.title: Tokyo

episodes.synopsis: Despite its dubious reputation, Lima proves to be a warm, welcoming city as Kamini samples food truck culture and family lunches with Jimena Agois.
episodes.title: Lima

episodes.synopsis: Renowned blogger Billy Law escorts Kamini on a tasty tour of Sydney's more traditional Australian offerings and its diverse immigrant food cultures.
episodes.title: Sydney

episodes.synopsis: Led by blogger Chawadee Nualkhair, who specializes in tracking down Bangkok's best street food, Kamini enjoys Thailand's constantly evolving cuisine.
episodes.title: Bangkok

episodes.synopsis: Kamini explores Johannesburg with Jono Hall, whose imaginative pop-up dinner helps Kamini understand how the city is regenerating itself with food.
episodes.title: Johannesburg

episodes.synopsis: Blogger Mia Irene Kristensen welcomes Kamini to Copenhagen, which prides itself on sustainable living and inventive approaches to seasonable foods.
episodes.title: Copenhagen

episodes.synopsis: Sara Porro welcomes Kamini to fashion-forward Milan, where she samples rabbit ragu, learns how to make risotto and enjoys locally sourced ingredients.
episodes.title: Milan

episodes.synopsis: Kamini joins enthusiastic eater Drew Lazor on a search of Philadelphia for the best roasted pork sandwiches, Amish chicken and locally brewed beer.
episodes.title: Philadelphia

episodes.synopsis: Kamini visits Berlin, where food activist Kavita Meelu encourages her to immerse herself in the global immigrant culture, which combines art and food.
episodes.title: Berlin

episodes.synopsis: Kamini visits the oasis of Dubai, where blogger Arva Ahmed takes her on a tasty tour of street food, Bedouin cuisine and Middle Eastern tradition.
episodes.title: Dubai
